info.name: Yahoo Fantasy Hockey - Black & Purple
info.description: This mod restores the dark look of Yahoo! Fantasy Hockey + adds a dash of the classic Yahoo! purple branding.
info.additionalInfo:
Original credit to: https://userstyles.org/styles/118518/yahoo-fantasy-football-dark-theme

I cleaned up a lot of the little things bothering me in his theme and applied it to Fantasy Hockey. I have a working Fantasy Football mod and will release that one soon. 

Tested on Safari on OS X only, but should work with other major browsers as well.
